title: The new building
content: Curious to know what was there in the place of the new building under construction

comments.body:
A lot of greenery - trees and lawns, 2 blocks (don't remember names) which were broken down, a larger pir^(3) area and even a merchandise store. In other words, an actual campus. 

The campus used to look nice before. A lot of stock photos you see on the PESU website and other media have been taken in those spots. Last time I checked there were quite a few pictures of that spot on PESU's Facebook page, feel free to check it out if you are interested.
